question: What is the earliest uncertainty you need to validate?
options: Architecture/Reuse - validate foundational patterns and reusable components early to prevent downstream rework
Impact - validate whether users care, intend to use, or will act on the solution (e.g., Wizard of Oz, landing pages, stubs)
Operations - validate operational readiness, deployment, monitoring, and support capabilities
System Integration - validate integration points with external systems, APIs, or partners
